activities.name: Numbers of Rows
activities.description: To get the numbers of rows

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT * FROM [@{variables('schema_name')}].[@{variables('table_name')}] 
WHERE order_date > '@{activity('Metadata of the Incremental Referesh').output.firstRow.last_refreshed}'

ifTrueActivities.name: Max Date For Last Updated Date Data

text.value:
SELECT MAX(order_date) as last_refreshed FROM [@{variables('schema_name')}].[@{variables('table_name')}]
WHERE order_date > '@{activity('Metadata of the Incremental Referesh').output.firstRow.last_refreshed}'

dependsOn.activity: Max Date For Last Updated Date Data

activities.name: Numbers of Rows
activities.description: To get the numbers of rows

text.value:

FROM [@{variables('schema_name')}].[@{variables('table_name')}] 
WHERE order_date > '@{activity('Metadata of the Incremental Referesh').output.firstRow.last_refreshed}'
